title: SYM: Character Symbol Instance
description: A single symbol instance on a base character. References the symbol catalog via symbol_codepoint for type metadata (name, category, Unicode details).

symbol_id.description: Unique identifier for this symbol instance (UUID v5 from naming convention)

character_ref.description: Foreign key to CHR (Character Composition) — the base letter this symbol modifies

symbol_codepoint.description: Unicode codepoint — foreign key to symbol catalog (e.g., U+064E for Fatha)
